note.p: American. Second daughter of Ebenezer Backus Jones, merchant, of Penn Yan, New York. Married Henry DeWitt Beman (1830–91), lawyer and farmer from Georgia, in 1855.
United States Federal Census 1850 (Milo, Yates, New York [1]/196b) (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 October 2020)
